headline: New information on police incident in York Co.
author: James Wesser
sentences: According to a CRIMEWATCH report, Lower Windsor Township Police responded to the 500 block of Bull Run Road for a welfare check on a 24-year-old man.
LOWER WINDSOR TOWNSHIP, Pa. (WHTM) â€” Police have released new information regarding a response to an incident in York County.
The name of the victim is not being released until the next of kin has been notified.
Once officers arrived at the scene, they attempted to make contact with the man.
When police entered, they heard a gunshot from the second floor of the house.

Officers then discovered that the person was deceased.
